install.name: Admin user access (backend)
install.author: Carsten Engel
install.copyright: (C) 2008 - 2011 Carsten Engel Engelweb. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module restricts admin-user access and displays the Admin_User_Access-toolbar (optional). 1. go to extensions > modules > administrator > 'Admin user access' 2. enabled -> 'yes' 3. position -> 'menu' 4. order -> right above 'admin menu'.
